      Constructor.
      Parameters:

      displayChar - Character to represent the player in the UI
      hitPoints - Player's starting number of hitpoints

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Description copied from class: Actor
      Select and return an action to perform on the current turn.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed

    • updateEcoPts

      private void updateEcoPts()
      This method is used to update the player's eco pts in each turn. The number of eco pts is increased by how many fruits were produced by the trees in the game & number of eggs that hatched

    • deductEcoPts

      protected void deductEcoPts​(int amount)
      This method is used to deduct the player's eco pts by a specific amount, for example when buying items
      Parameters:
      amount - represent the amount of eco pts that will be deducted from player's eco pts

    • handleUserChoice

      private void handleUserChoice​(int choice)
      This method is executed after user chose the game mode. If user selected the challenge mode, then user will be prompted for the number of turns and eco pts he/she plan to get in the selected number of turns
      Parameters:
      choice - the game option that the user chose

    • checkGameStatus

      private void checkGameStatus()
      This method is used to check if player won or lost the game at the end of the challenge mode

    • searchForFruit

      private SearchFruitAction searchForFruit()
      This method is used to check if there's a bush / tree in the same location of player. If so, then player can decide to search for a fruit on the source
      Returns:
      Action which will allow player to search for a fruit

    • feedDino

      private FeedDinoAction feedDino()
      This method is used by the player to feed a dinosaur only if player is adjacent to a dinosaur
      Returns:
      Action which will allow player to feed the dinosaur

    • moveToNextMap

      private MoveActorAction moveToNextMap()
      This method is used to check if player is at the very top of the first map, if so then player can move to the second map
      Returns:
      Action which will move player to the previous/first map

    • moveToPreviousMap

      private MoveActorAction moveToPreviousMap()
      This method is used to check if player is at the very end of the second map, if so then player can return to the first map
      Returns:
      Action which will move player to the previous/first map

    • restartGame

      private RestartAction restartGame()
      This method gives the player to restart the game
      Returns:
      Action which will restart the game for the player

    • useVM

      private UseVendingMachineAction useVM()
      This method is used so that player can use the vending machine(VM) provided player is in same location as the VM
      Returns:
      Action which will allow the player to use the vending machine
